text: Hello! I'm Traffic Manager at Legal Monster, currently implementing HubSpot :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi all! I’m a agency owner and responsible for all our HubSpot implementations, integrations and other technicalities. Not a developer by any standards but a marketing nerd not scared of trying to get stuff done :wink:
Hello all, i am new using HubSpot
Is it hard to code with it? I have experience coding but never used this platform before

We recommend starting your website build off using the boilerplate. That way you don’t have to learn everything all at once, you can start with a good foundation and focus on the pieces you need to learn in the moment.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate>
Hi everyone, new to HubSpot! Currently using it for the Sales Pipeline and Company/Contact records. Excited to learn more. Nice to meet all of you
